sofya
Class ReflectiveSofya.SofyaClassLoader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      sofya.ReflectiveSofya.SofyaClassLoader
Enclosing class:
ReflectiveSofya
protected static class ReflectiveSofya.SofyaClassLoader
extends java.lang.ClassLoader

Custom ClassLoader which determines when to load Sofya classes from an absolute internally specified location versus whether to load from the system CLASSPATH.

This is accomplished by investigating the runtime callstack to determine whether a class load request has originated from the executing instance of Sofya which is expected to be 'clean' or whether it has originated from a non-Sofya class or Sofya class invoked as part of testing. This class is dependent on ReflectiveSofya.SofyaSecurityManager.

Currently, the SofyaClassLoader expects to be instantiated by an application running in the 'sofya' directory, which is parent to the 'graphs', 'base', 'inst', 'viewers', and 'tools' directories, which constitutes the internal classpath from which the class loader attempts to load 'clean' Sofya class files.

Attempt to load a class.

This method simply calls loadClass(String, boolean) with the parameter resolve set to true.

loadClass

protected java.lang.Class<?> loadClass(java.lang.String name,
                                       boolean resolve)
                                throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Attempt to load a class.

Override of this method is intentional despite the delegation model recommended by Sun. The objective is to prevent the system classpath from being checked when we wish to load 'clean' Sofya classes, which cannot be accomplished by overriding just findClass().

Overrides:
loadClass in class java.lang.ClassLoader
Returns:
The requested java.lang.Class, if it can be found.
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If the class cannot be found.

findClass

protected java.lang.Class<?> findClass(java.lang.String name)
                                throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Attempt to locate a class.

This method is responsible for searching the internally specified classpath. It is called by this class loader when the system classpath is not to be searched.

Overrides:
findClass in class java.lang.ClassLoader
Returns:
The requested java.lang.Class, if it can be found.
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - If the class cannot be found.
